title: Riah Roo Says I Must Too!
features: A fun story about a little girl who is trying to do the same things as her older brother but things don't quite go the way she planed. With lots of brightly coloured illustrations your little one is sure to love it.Also. don’t forget to download the free Riah Roo Says I Must Too! printable children’s coloring pages at: books.riolowry.com/riahroo/
description: Rio Lowry has dreamed of becoming an author since he was a child. He grew up in a small town in southern Alberta where he developed a love for reading. He loved it so much that sometimes his parents would ground him from reading so that he would actually get his chores done! He now lives back in his hometown with his wife and children. When he is not planning a story Rio can be found devouring a good book (fantasy and science fiction are his favorites), creating computer programs or hanging out with his awesome family.
